name: St. Dominic Savio
summary: Dominic Savio was an Italian student of St. John Bosco who died at the age of 14. Despite his youth, he showed remarkable holiness, piety, and dedication to his studies and to helping others. He founded the Immaculate Conception Sodality among his fellow students. He is one of the youngest non-martyr saints in the Catholic Church and is the patron saint of choirboys, the falsely accused, and juvenile delinquents.
